title: New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons              During operating hours, we provide visitors with information, brochures, maps, exhibits, interactive kiosks, orientation film, and more. For additional information check the park calendar or contact us using the information below. Park Address and Hours  33 William Street New Bedford, MA 02740 508-996-4095   Regular Hours: Open Monday to Sunday  9:00 am to 5:00 pm   Winter Hours: Closed Mondays and Tuesdays starting January 4, 2016 to March 31, 2016 The visitor center will be open Wednesday to Sunday 9:00 am to 5:00 pm   Holidays  Closed on Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, and New Year’s Day.    NOTE: Please check our partner websites for operating hours and seasons or download Downtown New Bedford Inc’s Visitor Guide. Click here to download: Visitor Guide
